long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Shotgun takes your NFL Game Pass experience to the next level.

For the "Game View" side play list:

- Doing a breakdown of player highlights? Simply enter the player's name into the search bar to narrow down the selection of plays to the ones you care about.

- Want to save a play for later? Simply favorite it and the Shotgun extension will always remember.

Many other exciting features to come i.e. smarter searching, better video controls, shortcuts/hotkeys, etc. If you have any feedback or feature requests, please reach out to me at jdhayford@gmail.com
